name: Content Writer
author: SteadyContent

sections.description:
The SteadyContent “Content Writer” Plugin

We aren’t all professional writers. Your time can be spent better on building or working other areas of your business. The best time you can spend in your business is focusing on driving traffic and increasing conversions.

Let Content Writer help you communicate with the world, and give you your Saturdays back. The Content Writer plugin helps you scale your web presence without scaling your monthly payroll (no writers to layoff when things slow down).

Leverage our writers and technology to grow your content instead of having to write it all yourself.

Content Writer is a WordPress plugin that helps you to…
– Order and post content to your blog
– Gives you access to more than 6,000 expert writers
– All content includes up to (3) high-resolution photos
– All content can be posted automatically (via plugin) to your blog

Features of SteadyContent.com
– Unique article, post and content writing
– Social auto-posting
– Quick content ordering and configuration
– SMS/Text Notifications when content is ready
– Email notifications when content is ready

About

Content Writer is developed and maintained by SteadyContent (http://steadycontent.com). For any support, you may contact us

More Information

Requirements

WordPress 4.5+
PHP 5.2+

Feedback
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin to your local drive from WordPress.org
  2. Open your WordPress blog and click Plugins => Add New
  3. Click Upload Plugin and select the content-writer.zip file
  4. Click Activate Plugin
  5. Enter Your SteadyContent.com Email and Password and click Connect!
  6. If you do not have an account, click the link below Connect and follow the instructions.
